name: Portal through IT
description:
"Welcome to Portal Through It, a puzzle game that will put your problem-solving skills to the test. With 25 challenging levels, this game is sure to keep you entertained for hours.

NOTE - THIS GAME IS AutoSaving (thanks to Turbowarp) so you can reload the page, and play the game later, from where you have left.

Updates:

  • Version 2.0: In this update, the appearance of the third achievement was changed.

Controls: In this game, you'll control the player's movements using only the mouse, and use the space key for a faster run.

Assets: This game features a range of assets from various artists that add to the overall gaming experience.

  • Music: "Faraway" from the "Retro RPG Music Pack" by cat2x (https://cat2x.itch.io/retro-rpg-music-pack)
  • Player: "Pixel Pete's Art Assets" by Petermilko (https://petermilko.itch.io/pixel-petes-art-assets)
  • Mazes: Generated by "Maze Generator" (https://www.mazegenerator.net/)
  • Key: "Pixel Art Key" by drxwat (https://drxwat.itch.io/pixel-art-key)
  • Portal: "2D Pixel Art Portal Sprites" by elthen (https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-portal-sprites)
  • Background: "Parallax Background" by RavenTale (https://raventale.itch.io/parallax-background)
  • Sound Effect: "8-Bit/16-Bit Sound Effects Pack" by JDWasabi (https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack/)
  • Achievements: "Kyrise's Free 16x16 RPG Icon Pack" by Kyrise (https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack)
  • Icons in Settings: "Lucid Icon Pack" by Leo-Red (https://leo-red.itch.io/lucid-icon-pack)
  • Other: "Huge Universal Game Asset" by GameSupply (https://gamesupply.itch.io/huge-universal-game-asset)

This game is made for the Monthly Scratch Jam #6. The game jam theme is portals, which means the game should revolve around portals in some way. The wild card is that the game should only use the mouse and one keyboard key as controls. This adds an extra layer of challenge to the game, making it a unique and exciting experience.

Created between the 3rd and 5th of February 2023, Portal Through It is a game made using Scratch and converted with TurboWarp. Get ready to take on the challenge and enter the world of portals with Portal Through It."
